sentence: President Joe Biden's administration sent letters to television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz and former NFL player Herschel Walker Wednesday, asking them to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition or be terminated by the end of the day.
author: Lauren Frias
title: Biden asked Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from a presidential council or be terminated

sentence: President Joe Biden asked former NFL running back Herschel Walker and TV personality Mehmet Oz, M.D., to step down from their positions on the Presidentâ€™s Council on Sports, Fitness, and Nutrition.
title: Some federal employees can run for political office under the Hatch Act

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz wrote President Joe Biden to say he would not resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition despite being ordered to do so.
author: Charlie McCarthy
title: Dr. Oz Refuses to Resign From Fitness Council
